hero.title: Harness the Power of Artificial Intelligence
hero.description: Transform your business with cutting-edge AI solutions. We help companies leverage machine learning and automation to achieve remarkable growth.

about.title: We Make Your Business Smarter with Artificial Intelligence
about.description: Cyneryx is a next-generation technology company specialising in AI-driven automation, robotics integration, and digital transformation for supply chain, logistics, warehousing, and industrial environments.
about.description2: We help organisations design, build, integrate, and scale intelligent systems by combining Artificial Intelligence, robotics, and enterprise software into practical, real-world solutions. Our focus is on making advanced technology accessible, scalable, and cost-effective for businesses of all sizes.

services.title: Our Excellent AI Solutions for Your Business
services.description: Cyneryx is a next-generation technology company specialising in AI-driven automation, robotics integration, and digital transformation for supply chain, logistics, warehousing, and industrial environments.

serviceList.title: Robotic Automation
serviceList.description: Integration of AMRs, ACRs, and robotic systems. Vendor-agnostic robotics middleware with robotics-to-WMS/ERP connectivity for autonomous and semi-autonomous system design.

serviceList.title: Machine Learning
serviceList.description: AI orchestration engines and computer vision & AI vision gateways. Data-driven decision support systems for predictive maintenance and operational intelligence.

serviceList.title: Education & Science
serviceList.description: Solution architecture and technical strategy. MVP and SaaS product development with AI-first product design and digital transformation advisory.

serviceList.title: Predictive Analysis
serviceList.description: Advanced analytics and predictive maintenance. Operational intelligence systems that help organizations optimize operations and make data-driven decisions.

faqs.question: How to build a website?
faqs.answer: Building a website involves planning your content, choosing a domain name, selecting a hosting provider, and using website builders or coding to create your site.

faqs.question: How long will it take to get a new website?
faqs.answer: The timeline depends on the complexity of your project. Simple websites can be completed in 2-4 weeks, while more complex ones may take several months.

faqs.question: Do you only create HTML websites?
faqs.answer: No, we create responsive websites using modern technologies including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, and other frameworks suited to your needs.

faqs.question: Will my website be mobile-friendly?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our websites are built with mobile-first design principles and are fully responsive across all devices and screen sizes.

faqs.question: Will you maintain my site for me?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive maintenance and support packages to keep your website secure, updated, and performing optimally.

faqs.question: I'm on a strict budget. Do you have any low cost options?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We offer flexible pricing options and can work with various budget constraints while maintaining quality standards.

team.title: Meet Our Experienced Team Members
